org.opt4j.core.start

Class Opt4JModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.inject.AbstractModule
      • org.opt4j.core.start.Opt4JModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArchiveModule, CoolingScheduleModule, IndividualCompleterModule, MatingModule, OperatorModule, OptimizerModule, OutputModule, ProblemModule, RandomModule, SATModule, SelectorModule

    public abstract class Opt4JModule
extends AbstractModule
    The Opt4JModule is the superclass for all modules. The class and its fields might be extended with certain annotations. See Constant and the org.opt4j.core.config.annotations package.
    See Also:
    Constant, Category, File, Icon, Ignore, Info, Multi, Name, Order, Panel, Parent, Required
